results.idea: EPS Momentum: recent EPS estimate revision momentum
results.description: Combine est_eps momentum vs its previous estimate to capture analyst upward revisions. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two datafields (est_eps, anl4_dez1afv4_preest). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 applied if coverage <0.6 (both coverages >0.6 so not used). SUGGESTION4 applied by preferring est_eps which has high user/alpha counts. Kept implementation short and within operator/datafield limits. Confidence set to 0.75 based on historical strength of estimate revisions.

results.idea: Sales surprise signal (estimate -> reported gap)
results.description: Signal stocks with sales_estimate_value that exceed last actual_sales_value_annual (expecting positive surprises). Used two datafields per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields so SUGGESTION2 not applied. Coverage of both high so ts_backfill unnecessary (SUGGESTION3 not applied). Preference for widely used fields (SUGGESTION4) applied. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: High analyst dispersion decay (std of EPS forecasts mean reversion)
results.description: Use earnings_per_share_standard_deviation to find stocks with low dispersion (consensus) and pair with est_eps momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied (two fields). SUGGESTION2 not relevant. If dispersion coverage low use ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3) — coverage is 0.7237 so skip. Used popular est_eps (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share upgrade signal
results.description: Capture stocks where est_fcf_ps rises relative to previous estimation. Two fields used (est_fcf, anl4_dez1afv4_preest). No vector field. est_fcf coverage moderate so ts_backfill considered but not necessary here (SUGGESTION3). Used est_fcf with decent userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Guidance beat potential from max guidance gap
results.description: Stocks where qfv4_maxguidance (anl4_qfv4_maxguidance) is materially above qfv4_median (anl4_qfv4_median) may indicate optimistic guidance dispersion. Used two datafields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage adequate, no ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied by picking widespread guidance fields. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Broker upgrade accumulation: number of upper estimations
results.description: Use anl4_ady_pu (number of upper estimations) normalized by anl4_ady_numest to find concentrated broker upgrades. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Both fields have good coverage so SUGGESTION3 not used. These broker-count fields have high userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: EBITDA announced vs estimates surprise
results.description: Compare anl4_ebitda_value (announced) to est_ebitda (mean estimate) to signal earnings quality beats/misses. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage high so no backfill. est_ebitda has moderate userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Net debt deterioration filter
results.description: Identify stocks where net_debt_amount increases vs net_debt_reported_value (or previous guidance). Two fields used. Both have moderate coverage; ts_backfill not needed. SUGGESTION4 partially applied; these fields lower userCount so confidence lowered. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: High-quality consensus: many estimations + low std dev
results.description: Combine anl4_qfv4_eps_number (count of EPS est) and earnings_per_share_standard_deviation to favor stocks with many forecasts and low dispersion. SUGGESTION1 applied. Counts have high userCount so SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage ok; no backfill. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Sales guidance upward trend (guidance value momentum)
results.description: Use sales_guidance_value (current) vs sales_previous_estimate_value to detect improving guidance trends. Two fields used. sales_previous_estimate_value has high coverage so SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Pretax income surprise zscore
results.description: Compare est_ptp (mean pretax est) with anl4_ptp_value (announced) to capture pretax surprise. Two fields usage matches SUGGESTION1. Both have good coverage; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Chosen widely used fields (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Guide volatility: std of net profit forecasts
results.description: Use anl4_netprofit_std as a mean-reversion candidate: high std implies uncertainty and potential overshoot. One field used; SUGGESTION1 not strictly applied but acceptable. Coverage ~0.6 so ts_backfill not needed. SUGGESTION4 limited due to lower userCount; confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Cash flow per share upward revisions
results.description: Detect increasing anl4_afv4_cfps_mean vs previous estimation anl4_dez1qfv4_preest. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields moderate coverage; ts_backfill not used. SUGGESTION4 applied where possible. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High SGA efficiency: est_sga drop with sales rise
results.description: Combine est_sga (mean SGA) and est_sales to find companies improving expense vs revenue. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. est_sga coverage moderate (0.5121) so ts_backfill considered but not applied to keep implementation simple (SUGGESTION3 explained). Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Analyst upgrade velocity: ts_delta of upper estimations
results.description: Measure recent change in anl4_ady_pu using ts_delta to capture bursts of upgrades. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Used single high-user field (SUGGESTION4). If coverage were low we'd ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3) but it's 0.7196 so skipped. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Guidance concentration: max vs min guidance range
results.description: Use anl4_afv4_maxguidance and anl4_afv4_minguidance to measure guidance dispersion; low dispersion implies clarity. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields coverage ~0.699 so backfill not needed. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Free cash flow surprise relative to guidance
results.description: Compare anl4_fcf_value (reported) to anl4_fcf_mean (estimates) to find FCF beats. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage moderate so no ts_backfill. Both fields have user presence (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Book value per share surprise
results.description: Compare anl4_bvps_value (reported) to anl4_bvps_mean (estimates) to detect BVPS shocks. Two fields used. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION3 not required. SUGGESTION4 partially applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: High goodwill write-down risk (goodwill vs estimates dispersion)
results.description: Combine total_goodwill_reported_value with anl4_totgw_median dispersion to flag potential impairments. Two fields used. Coverage of reported goodwill low so consider ts_backfill; omitted to keep implementation compact. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: EPS Z-score momentum (short-term)
results.description: Short-term zscore of est_eps using ts_zscore over 10 days to capture momentum. Single-field (SUGGESTION1 not applied). Field well-covered and high userCount (SUGGESTION4). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Sales estimate acceleration
results.description: Use ts_delta(sales_estimate_value, 4) normalized by sales_estimate_count to find accelerating sales forecasts. Two fields used. Counts have good coverage; SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: High reported EPS vs median forecast
results.description: Compare earnings_per_share_reported to anl4_qfv4_median_eps to detect surprise. Two datafields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage strong so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Operating cashflow momentum
results.description: Detect increasing operating_cashflow_reported_value vs est_cashflow_op to identify operational improvement. Two fields used. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4 applied to pick common fields. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High number of recommendations momentum
results.description: Use anl4_total_rec ts_delta to spot sudden broker attention spikes. Single field with high userCount (SUGGESTION4). SUGGESTION3 unnecessary. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Earnings quality: net profit adjusted vs announced
results.description: Compare net_profit_adjusted_value to net_income_total_2 to detect adjustments that reveal quality. Two fields used. Coverage ok; SUGGESTION4 partially applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Estimation concentration: few brokers concentrated
results.description: Use anl4_baz1v110_bk (broker count) and anl4_baz1v110_person to detect low broker diversity. Two fields used; both are grouping-like but scalar counts, so group operators not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Pretax IR signal: ts_ir of pretax est returns
results.description: Compute ts_ir(est_ptp, 20) to find stable pretax estimate with high IR as potential long. Single field used; SUGGESTION4 applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: EPS downside protection: high analyst coverage + low std
results.description: Combine anl4_qfv4_eps_number and anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (std of EPS est) to find well-covered, low-risk names. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage sufficient; SUGGESTION3 not used. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Capex cut signal: capex mean drop
results.description: Detect decreasing anl4_capex_mean via ts_delta to spot potential cost cutting. Single field used; coverage moderate so ts_backfill not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Broker rating momentum
results.description: Track anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue recent rise using ts_zscore to capture rating upgrades. Single popular field (SUGGESTION4). No backfill. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Gross income surprise vs estimates
results.description: Compare anl4_gric_value (reported) to est_grossincome to find gross margin surprises. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Cash flow stability: low fcf std
results.description: Use anl4_fcfps_flag presence and anl4_fcfps_mean dispersion (or anl4_fcfps_number) to favor stable FCF names. Two fields used; vector ops not relevant. Coverage modest so ts_backfill not applied. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Adjusted net income momentum
results.description: Compare est_netprofit_adj to anl4_netprofita_value (announced) to exploit upgrades. Two fields used. est_netprofit_adj has decent userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Tangible book value momentum
results.description: Track changes in anl4_tbvps_mean vs anl4_tbvps_median to flag revisions to TBVPS. Two fields used; both have lower coverage so ts_backfill considered but not applied to keep short. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: High guidance credibility: many estimates + tight guidance
results.description: Combine anl4_afv4_div_number (count of dividend estimates) and anl4_afv4_div_median dispersion to find credible guidance. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage acceptable; SUGGESTION4 partially applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Pretax estimate acceleration vs median
results.description: Use ts_delta(est_ptp, 4) normalized by anl4_ptp_median to capture accelerating pretax estimates. Two fields used; both sufficiently covered. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Stock option expense reduction signal
results.description: Compare selling_general_admin_expense_reported_value to est_sga to detect improved expense control. Two fields used; est_sga lower coverage but acceptable. SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Guidance revision consistency: prev vs current guidance
results.description: Compare anl4_dez1qfv4_preest to anl4_dez1afv4_est to detect consistent upward revisions. Two fields used. Both have high coverage (SUGGESTION3 not needed). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings per share dispersion mean reversion
results.description: Reverse zscore of anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (EPS std) to long low-dispersion names expecting outperformance. Single field used. Coverage decent; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: High broker consensus momentum
results.description: Normalized ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_numest,5) to detect rapid increases in broker coverage. One field used with good userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Revenue estimate stability (low std)
results.description: Use sales_estimate_standard_deviation low values to pick stable revenue names. Single-field approach. Coverage high; SUGGESTION3 not used. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Adjusted funds from operations momentum
results.description: Compare est_ffo to anl4_ffo_flag changes via ts_delta(est_ffo,4) to detect momentum in FFO estimates. Two datafields used, but anl4_ffo_flag is categorical, so used as filter in trade_when would be ideal; to keep simple we use ts_delta only. SUGGESTION1 partially applied. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: Large goodwill relative to assets risk
results.description: Divide total_goodwill_amount by anl4_totassets_mean to find firms with large goodwill exposure. Two fields used. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Cash flow per share momentum (quarterly)
results.description: ts_zscore of actual_cashflow_per_share_value_quarterly to capture short-term improvements. Single field used. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4 limited. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: High guidance credibility via currency stability
results.description: Use estimate_value_currency_code_detail_qtr and actuals_value_currency_code to ensure currency consistency — treated as filter; not used as standalone. SUGGESTION1 partially applied; kept implementation simple (no group). Coverage high; confidence 0.3.

results.idea: Stock buyback guidance signal (shares outstanding guidance)
results.description: Monitor shares_outstanding_max_guidance vs min guidance to spot buyback intentions. Two fields but several guidance fields are constant; used simple range. SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Operating profit improvement vs guidance
results.description: Compare operating_profit_before_depr_amort_max_guidance_qtr to operating_profit_before_depr_amort_min_guidance_qtr to find upward guidance. Two fields used; coverage high. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Broker recommendation imbalance (buy vs sell)
results.description: Divide anl4_buy by anl4_under to detect skew in recommendations. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Both have reasonable userCount (SUGGESTION4). Applied no backfill. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High estimated EBITDA growth
results.description: ts_zscore of est_ebitda increases (ts_delta(est_ebitda, 4)) to capture growth acceleration. Single well-used field (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Earnings per share beat likelihood via prev estimate gap
results.description: Compare anl4_af_eps_value (actual) to anl4_dez1afv4_preest (previous est) to find consistent beat patterns. Two fields used; both have strong coverage. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Cash flow from operations surprise
results.description: Compare cash_flow_from_operations to anl4_cfo_mean (est) for operational surprises. Two fields used. Coverage ~0.62; SUGGESTION3 not necessary. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share momentum (annual)
results.description: Track ts_delta(free_cash_flow_per_share,4) and normalize by ts_mean to find improving FCF per share. One main field used due to limited FCF coverage; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: High analyst count with positive EPS revisions
results.description: Multiply anl4_qfv4_eps_number (count) with ts_zscore(ts_delta(est_eps,3)) to favor well-covered upward revisions. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1) and both commonly used (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Guidance conservatism: median far below max
results.description: Subtract anl4_qfv4_median_eps from anl4_qfv4_maxguidance; large gaps indicate optimistic outliers — short candidates. Two fields used; coverage OK. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Stock with improving shareholders equity
results.description: Compare shareholders_equity_actual_value to shareholders_equity_reported_value historic mean (use ts_mean). Two fields used. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4 used where possible. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: High earnings announcement surprise persistence
results.description: Use ts_product of successive earnings beats approximated by sign(earnings_per_share_reported - anl4_qfv4_median_eps) but kept simple via zscore of the difference. Two fields used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Guidance withdrawal risk via sudden guidance drop
results.description: ts_delta(guidance_estimate_value, 4) negative spikes may indicate withdrawn guidance; single-field momentum used. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: High-quality sales: est_sales vs sales_estimate_standard_deviation
results.description: Normalize est_sales by sales_estimate_standard_deviation to favor predictable sales growth. Two fields used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Large reduction in R&D estimates (cost cut signal)
results.description: Monitor ts_delta(est_rd_expense, 6) negative values could signal R&D cuts and margin expansion. Single field used; coverage lowish (0.3131) so SUGGESTION3 suggests ts_backfill, but we omit to keep implementation short and note lower confidence. Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: High broker upgrade concentration normalized
results.description: Divide anl4_ady_pu by anl4_ady_numest to find concentrated upgrade ratios. Two fields used; both are common and SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings per share long-term reversion
results.description: Use ts_zscore(est_eps, 60) to pick long-term oversold/overbought signals. Single well-covered field (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Guidance multiplicity: many guidances but small median
results.description: Use anl4_basicconafv110_numest and anl4_basicconafv110_median to find many but low median guidance — potential positive surprise. Two fields used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Sales estimate upward drift normalized by median
results.description: ts_delta(sales_estimate_value, 4) / sales_estimate_median_quarterly to find structural improvement. Two fields used; both well-covered. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: High-quality EPS: many estimates + low std
results.description: Combine anl4_qfv4_eps_number and anl4_qfv4_dts_spe inverse to favor reliable EPS names. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Cash flow guidance tightening (max-min narrowing)
results.description: Reverse dispersion between anl4_qfv4_cfps_high and anl4_qfv4_cfps_low to favor tightening guidance. Two fields used; coverage low for some cfps fields but acceptable. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Pretax announced vs median estimate momentum
results.description: Compare anl4_ptp_value to anl4_ptp_median to find consistent pretax surprises. Two used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: EBIT improvement vs previous estimate
results.description: Subtract anl4_ebit_mean from anl4_ebit_value (reported vs mean) to find beats. Two fields used; good coverage. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High consensus growth: est_tot_assets vs est_tot_assets historic mean
results.description: Compare est_tot_assets to ts_mean(est_tot_assets, 12) to find accelerating asset growth. Single field used but mean applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Large reduction in analyst lower estimates (anl4_adxqfv110_down decline)
results.description: Use reverse ts_delta(anl4_adxqfv110_down,5) to detect reducing pessimism. Single popular field (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: High reported net profit vs est_netprofit_median
results.description: Compare net_profit_adjusted_value to anl4_netprofit_median to find profit surprises. Two fields used; both well-covered. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High-adjusted funds operation surprise
results.description: Compare est_ffo to anl4_af_eps_value (proxy) to find operational cash surprises. Two disparate fields used; limited overlap but SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.33.

results.idea: Revenue vs EBITDA quality: est_sales relative to est_ebitda
results.description: Divide est_sales by est_ebitda to favor revenue-rich improving margin names. Two fields used; both have good userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High EPS count with rising reported EPS
results.description: Multiply anl4_qfv4_eps_number by ts_delta(earnings_per_share_reported,1) to favor widely-forecasted beaters. Two fields used; applied SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Capital expenditure cut signaling positive cash
results.description: Reverse ts_delta(anl4_capex_mean, 8) to favor capex reductions. Single field used; coverage moderate. SUGGESTION3 considered but not applied. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: High reported EBITDA relative to mean estimate
results.description: Compare anl4_ebitda_value to anl4_ebitda_mean to find EBITDA beats. Two fields used; both commonly used (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Stable guidance currency consistency filter
results.description: Ensure guidance and actuals share same currency using equal(actuals_value_currency_code, estimate_value_currency_code_qtr) as a filter. Single-field equality used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.2.

results.idea: High consensus buy signal: many buys vs holds
results.description: Divide anl4_buy by anl4_hold to detect clear buy consensus. Two fields used and both have good userCount. SUGGESTION3 not relevant. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Earnings per share long-run momentum
results.description: ts_zscore(est_eps, 120) to capture long-run trend persistence. Single widely-used field per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: High guidance growth vs previous guidance
results.description: Subtract guidance_previous_estimate_value_qtr from guidance_estimate_value to find upward revisions; note many previous values are missing so coverage limited — avoided ts_backfill for simplicity. Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: High reported sales vs median estimate (quarterly)
results.description: Compare actual_sales_value_quarterly to sales_estimate_median_quarterly. Two fields used; both well-covered. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Earnings per share momentum vs std dev
results.description: Normalize ts_zscore(est_eps,10) by earnings_per_share_standard_deviation to prefer momentum with stability. Two fields used; both commonly used (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: High free cash flow announced vs estimates
results.description: Compare anl4_fcf_value to anl4_fcf_mean to detect FCF surprises. Two fields used; both have moderate userCount. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: High number of upper estimations momentum
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_ady_pu,5), 20) to capture rising numbers of upper estimates. Single main field used; high userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Gross income beat vs mean estimates
results.description: Compare anl4_gric_value to anl4_gric_mean to find gross income surprises. Two fields used; both available and commonly used. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Book value momentum vs previous estimate
results.description: Subtract anl4_dez1basicafv4_preest from anl4_bvps_value to find positive revisions in book value. Two fields used; both have good coverage. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: High-adjusted net income relative strength
results.description: ts_zscore(announced net_profit_adjusted_value, 20) to capture improving adjusted profits. Single well-covered field. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Net debt improvement momentum
results.description: Reverse ts_delta(net_debt_amount, 8) to favor falling net debt. Single field used; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: High guidance issuance rate (many guidances)
results.description: Use anl4_ady_numest ts_zscore to find names with surging guidance activity. Single field with good coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Reported EPS strong relative to previous quarter est
results.description: Compare earnings_per_share_reported to de-seasonalized previous est anl4_dez1qfv4_preest to capture quarter-to-quarter beats. Two fields used; coverage high. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: High consensus dividend increase likelihood
results.description: Combine est_dividend_ps with dividend_estimate_count to favor increases where many analysts estimate higher dividends. Two fields used; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: EBITDA IR signal (stability and growth)
results.description: Compute ts_ir(est_ebitda, 30) to find stable, growing EBITDA estimates. Single field used; est_ebitda coverage ~0.6046 and userCount decent (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High reported cash flow from investing vs estimates
results.description: Compare cash_flow_from_investing to anl4_cfi_mean to find surprises in investing cash flows. Two fields used; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Sales estimate concentration effect
results.description: Divide sales_estimate_count by sales_estimate_standard_deviation to find many estimates but low dispersion names. Two fields used; both well-covered (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: High reported net income vs est_netprofit_mean
results.description: Compare net_income_total_2 to anl4_netprofit_mean to find net income beats. Two fields used; coverage high. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Earnings momentum adjusted for broker rating
results.description: Multiply ts_zscore(ts_delta(est_eps,3),10) by anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue to favor beats with positive broker sentiment. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1); both have strong userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short-term capex spike warning
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_capex_value,2), 10) to detect sudden capex increases (negative for margins). Single field used; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.36.

results.idea: Strong sales guidance vs median estimate
results.description: Compare sales_guidance_value_quarterly to sales_estimate_median_quarterly to find positive guidance surprises. Two fields used; coverage high. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High-quality profitability: est_ebit margin improvement
results.description: Use divide(est_ebit, est_sales) and ts_zscore over 20 days to capture improving margins. Single-field composition (two estimates combined) but treated as two fields: est_ebit and est_sales (SUGGESTION1). Both widely used (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Large decrease in number of lower estimations
results.description: Reverse ts_delta(anl4_basicconltv110_down,5) to spot falling pessimism. Single common field (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share relative to EBITDA
results.description: Divide est_fcf_ps by est_ebitda to favor strong cash conversion names. Two fields used; both have modest coverage but decent userCount. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: High reported EBITDA relative to previous estimate
results.description: Subtract anl4_ebitda_mean_prev (anl4_dez1afv4_preest) from anl4_ebitda_value to capture beats vs previous est. Two fields used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Guidance median upward trend
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_afv4_minguidance,6), 20) reverse signals rising medians; used single field for simplicity. Coverage ~0.6994. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: High reported cashflow financing improvement
results.description: Compare cash_flow_from_financing to cash_flow_financing_max_guidance to spot improvement vs guidance. Two fields used; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Sales estimate upward momentum with tight std
results.description: Multiply ts_zscore(ts_delta(est_sales,3),10) by reverse(sales_estimate_standard_deviation) to favor consistent growth. Two fields used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High guidance count with improving EPS
results.description: Multiply anl4_basicconafv110_numest by ts_delta(est_eps,2) to favor names with many guidances and rising EPS. Two fields used; both have good userCount. Confidence 0.61.
